channel.title: CVE Feed for npm -- cli
channel.description: The latest CVEs for npm -- cli

item.title: CVE-2020-15095|2024-08-04T13:08:21.646Z -- npm -- cli
item.description: Versions of the npm CLI prior to 6.14.6 are vulnerable to an information exposure vulnerability through log files. The CLI supports URLs like "<protocol>://[<user>[:<password>]@]<hostname>[:<port>][:][/]<path>". The password value is not redacted and is printed to stdout and also to any generated log files.
